item.title: My New Favorite Architecture: Using n8n as a Mid Server
item.description: For a while, my pride told me visual builders weren’t for professional engineers. I never said it out loud, but I thought it: drag-and-drop tools were suitable for prototypes, business folks, or anyone trying to avoid writing conventional code. They weren’t for people who knew how to build things the established way. Then I started using n8n to build AI agents, and it didn’t take long before my conviction began to waver. Because pretty quickly, I realized that instead of a limitation, this was a superpower.
